Bugi And FriendsğŸ”
Sometimes they move, and sometimes they have speech bubbles to express their emotions. 
You can grab them and drag them around, you can even throw them.
Click to make it go somewhere.

<Details for bugi>
When you turn on the extension, Bugi appears on the screen.
[Walking]
While standing still, Bugi has a 10% chance to start walking every 2 seconds. This will last for 5 seconds.
If you touch or click on Bugi, it will start walking for 5 seconds, targeting a random coordinate on the screen. 
[Drag to move]
You can drag Bugi to reposition him.
Bugi flies by the momentum at the end of the dragging.
[Emote with speech bubbles].
While dragging, Bugi displays a speech bubble with a panicked expression.
Hovering over Bugi will release the bubble.
When not being dragged, Bugi has a 10% chance every 1 seconds to change its current facial expression (emotion) and display a speech bubble.

------ [ Change Log ] -------

Update 1.1.0 - November 25, 2024
- Bugi can now be thrown.
  => When dragging Bugi, it will inertially move with a momentum equal to the momentum at the end of the drag.
- Added Bugi's facial expressions.
- If you are dragging Bugi and your mouse leaves the browser, dragging will now end.
- Fixed a bug with fast movement on monitors with high refresh rates.
- Limited the target point that Bugi randomly moves to to 300px around it.
- Fixed a bug with Bugi's speech bubbles on some sites, and made Bugi slightly smaller on smaller screens.

Update 1.2.0 - January 6, 2025
- We're now notifying you in a separate popup panel when Bugi is unavailable.
- Clicking on the extension will now open a popup panel, rather than launching Bugi directly.
  - Click the â€œOrder Bugiâ€ button on the first one to place a Bugi in a random location.
  - Click the second â€œDiscard Bugiâ€ button to get rid of one Bugi.
  - Click the third â€œDiscard all Bugisâ€ button to remove all Bugis.
- You can now create any number of  Bugis (up to 50).

Update 1.2.1 - January 7, 2025
- Fixed a bug when creating a new Bugi.
